title: Overseas voter's registration address
context: [ยง15D-5] Overseas voter&rsquo;s registration address. In registering to vote, an overseas voter who is eligible to vote in this State shall use and be assigned to the voting district of the person&rsquo;s residence, or the last place of residence prior to leaving this State, or, in the case of a voter described by paragraph (4) of the definition of &ldquo;covered voter&rdquo; under section 15D-2, the address of the last place of residence in this State of the parent or legal guardian of the voter. If that address is no longer a recognized residential address, the voter shall be assigned a district for voting purposes. [L 2012, c 226, pt of ยง1]
